name: a11y-challenges
author: Michael Brandst√§tter | Thomas Dax | Daniela Kubesch | Luca Pircher

scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix services/api install && npm --prefix services/site install && npm --prefix services/submission-checker install
scripts.lint: npm --prefix services/api run lint && npm --prefix services/site run lint
scripts.stop: pm2 stop a11y-challenges && pm2 del a11y-challenges
scripts.dev:api: npm --prefix services/api install && npm --prefix services/api run start:dev
scripts.dev:site: npm --prefix services/site install && wait-on -l tcp:$API_PORT && npm --prefix services/site run dev
scripts.dev:submission-checker: npm --prefix services/submission-checker install && npm --prefix services/submission-checker run start:dev
